    MMTF.addheader — Function.

    Add the header to the appropriate array

    MMTF.bytes — Function.

    Convert an integer array into a byte arrays.

    MMTF.chars — Function.

    Convert integers to chars.

    MMTF.decodearray — Function.

    Parse the header of an input byte array and then decode using the input array, the codec and the appropirate parameter. input_array: the array to be decoded

    MMTF.decodechainlist — Function.

    Convert a list of bytes to a list of strings. Each string is of length mmtf.CHAIN_LEN

    MMTF.decodedata — Function.

    Decodes the MsgPack unpacked dict of the MMTF file.

    MMTF.deltadecode — Function.

    A function to delta decode an int array. in_array: the input array of integers

    MMTF.deltaencode — Function.

    A function to delta decode an int array. in_array: the input array to be delta encoded

    MMTF.deltarecursivefloatdecode
    MMTF.deltarecursivefloatencode
    MMTF.encodearray — Function.

    Encode the array using the method and then add the header to this array. input_array: the array to be encoded codec: the integer index of the codec to use param: the integer parameter to use in the function

    MMTF.encodechainlist — Function.

    Convert a list of strings to a list of byte arrays.

    MMTF.encodedata — Function.

    Encodes the MMTF Dict.

    MMTF.eval
    MMTF.fetchmmtf — Function.

    Fetches a file from RCSB server and decodes it into a MMTFDict. pdbid: ID of the PDB file to be fetched and decoded.

    MMTF.floats — Function.

    Convert integers to floats by division. in_ints: the integer array divider: the divider

    MMTF.fourbyteintdecode
    MMTF.fourbyteintencode
    MMTF.htonofarray
    MMTF.include
    MMTF.intdecode
    MMTF.intencode
    MMTF.ints — Function.

    Convert a byte array into an integer array. The number of bytes forming an integer is defined by num in_bytes: the input bytes num: the number of bytes per int

    Convert floating points to integers using a multiplier. in_floats: the input floats multiplier: the multiplier to be used for conversion. Corresponds to the precisison.

    Convert an array of chars to an array of ints.

    MMTF.ntohofarray
    MMTF.parseheader — Function.

    Parse the header and return it along with the input array minus the header. Returns the codec, the length of the decoded array, the parameter and the remainder of the array

    MMTF.parsemmtf — Function.

    Parses the MMTF file into a MMTFDict. filepath: Path of the input file.

    MMTF.recursiveindexdecode — Function.

    Unpack an array of integers using recursive indexing.

    MMTF.recursiveindexencode — Function.

    Pack an integer array using recursive indexing.

    MMTF.runlengthchardecode
    MMTF.runlengthcharencode
    MMTF.runlengthdecode — Function.

    A function to run length decode an int array. in_array: the input array of integers

    MMTF.runlengthdeltaintdecode
    MMTF.runlengthdeltaintencode
    MMTF.runlengthencode — Function.

    A function to run length decode an int array. in_array: the inptut array of integers

    MMTF.runlengthfloatdecode
    MMTF.runlengthfloatencode
    MMTF.stringdecode
    MMTF.stringencode
    MMTF.writemmtf — Function.

    Writes the MMTFDict back to a file. MMTFDict: Dict containing the decoded MMTF data to be written to file. filepath: Path to write the file
